BetterBeginnings:Brute.NAME: Brute
BetterBeginnings:Brute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

BetterBeginnings:Cowardice.NAME: Cowardice
BetterBeginnings:Cowardice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Dazed to your draw pile.
BetterBeginnings:Cowardice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Dazed to your draw pile and hand.

BetterBeginnings:DataRecovery.NAME: Data Recovery
BetterBeginnings:DataRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Move !M! card from your discard pile to your draw pile.
BetterBeginnings:DataRecovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Move !M! cards from your discard pile to your draw pile.

BetterBeginnings:Plague.NAME: Plague
BetterBeginnings:Plague.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

BetterBeginnings:StabAndStrike.NAME: Stab And Strike
BetterBeginnings:StabAndStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Shiv to your hand.
